forensics_hardening_phase2.title: Forensics Logic Stabilization (Wave 6)
forensics_hardening_phase2.instruction_raw: Fix core structural logic identified in implementation_plan_wave6.md. Target: Eliminate 'Destination account does not exist' for new firms, register education_spending, and prevent NULL seller IDs in Sagas.

MISSION_firm_api_dto.title: Firm Module API & DTO Realignment
MISSION_firm_api_dto.instruction_raw: Align FirmStateDTO/FirmConfigDTO. Add inventory/liability fields. Hardcode FirmFactory usage for atomicity.

MISSION_household_api_dto.title: Household Module API & DTO Realignment
MISSION_household_api_dto.instruction_raw: Implement Snapshot-based communication. Refactor consumption logic to return DTOs. Enforce assets_pennies SSoT.

MISSION_labor_api_dto.title: Labor Module API & DTO Realignment
MISSION_labor_api_dto.instruction_raw: Decouple MatchingEngine from agent attributes. Standardize JobOffer/JobSeeker DTOs. Implement bargaining via snapshots.
